ekaw#Event: The conferencebanquet and the scientificevent are both parented by the same event. The socialevent and the individualpresentation are also parented by the same event.
ekaw#Person: The parent of a conferenceparticipant is the lateregisteredparticipant. The student is the parent of the paperauthor and the possiblereviewer is the parent of the member of the agency staff.
ekaw#Accepted_Paper: Acceptedpaper is the child of evaluatedpaper and the parent of rejectedpaper.
ekaw#Rejected_Paper: The rejected paper is the child of the evaluated paper and the accepted paper.
ekaw#Evaluated_Paper: The evaluatedpaper is the parent of acceptedpaper and rejectedpaper. The assignedpaper is the child of submittedpaper and the posterpaper is the child of evaluatedpaper.
ekaw#Camera_Ready_Paper: camerareadypaper is a child of paper which is the parent of regularpaper.
ekaw#Positive_Review: The positivereview is a child of review which is a document which is parented by paper and industrialpaper.
ekaw#Workshop_Paper: The workshoppaper is a child of paper which is the parent of the demopaper.
ekaw#Industrial_Paper: Industrialpaper is a child of paper and a document.
ekaw#Paper: Paper is the parent of demopaper and workshoppaper. It is also the parent of the website and cameraready paper.
ekaw#Conference_Paper: conferencepaper is the child of paper and is the parent of demopaper.
ekaw#Industrial_Session: The industrialsession is the child of the conferencesession and the scientificevent which is the parent of the workshop.
ekaw#Conference_Session: The conferencesession is the parent of the industrialsession and the scientificevent.
ekaw#Regular_Session: The regularsession is the child of the session and the parent of the postersession.
ekaw#Poster_Session: The postersession is the child of the session which is the parent of the demosession.
ekaw#Demo_Session: The demosession is a child of the scientificevent.
ekaw#Session: The session is the child of the scientificevent and the social event. It is also the parent of the conferencebanquet, the regularsession and the industrialsession.
ekaw#Abstract: The abstract is the parent of invitedtalkabstract and tutorialabstract. Paper is the parent of submittedpaper.
ekaw#Document: The document is the parent of the conferenceproceedings, the proceedings, and the flyer. It is also the parent of the flyer and the website. It is also the parent of the review, which is also the parent of the neutralreview.
ekaw#Paper_Author: The paperauthor is the child of the conferenceparticipant and the chair. The workshopchair is the child of the chair and the conferenceparticipant.
ekaw#Conference_Trip: The conferencetrip is a child of socialvent which is the parent event of scientificevent which is the parent event of workshop.
ekaw#Social_Event: Socialvent is the parent of conferencetrip and scientificevent. It is also the parent of conferencebanquet.
ekaw#Tutorial_Abstract: The abstract is a child of the tutorial abstract which is a child of the document which is parented by paper which is also parented by industrialpaper.
ekaw#Conference_Participant: The conferenceparticipant is the parent of the paperauthor, the presenter, the invited speaker and the sessionchair. The child of the sessionchair and the possible reviewer is also the parent of the chair.
ekaw#Submitted_Paper: The paper submitted is the child of the document, the assignedpaper is the parent of acceptedpaper and the evaluatedpaper is the parent of acceptedpaper.
ekaw#Assigned_Paper: The assignedpaper is the child of submittedpaper and evaluatedpaper. The paper is also the parent of conferencepaper and rejectedpaper.
ekaw#Negative_Review: The negativereview is the child of the review and the parent of the positivereview.
ekaw#Review: Review is a child of the program brochure. It is also the parent of the negativereview and the positivereview.
ekaw#Neutral_Review: neutralreview is a child of review and is the parent of negativereview.
ekaw#Organising_Agency: organisingagency is a child of the organisation which is parented by proceedingspublisher.
ekaw#Academic_Institution: The academicinstitution is the child of the organisation that publishes proceedings. It is also the parent of the university and the researchinstitute.
ekaw#Organisation: The organisingagency is the parent organisation of the proceedings publisher. The academicinstitution is the parent organisation of the researchinstitute.
ekaw#Proceedings_Publisher: The proceedingspublisher is a child of the organisation which is parented by the organisation.
ekaw#Poster_Paper: Posterpaper is a child of paper and is the parent of workshoppaper.
ekaw#Regular_Paper: Paper is a child of paper and is the parent of industrial paper.
ekaw#Demo_Paper: Demopaper is a child of paper and a document.
ekaw#Research_Institute: The researchinstitute is a child of the academicinstitution which is a child of the organisation.
ekaw#Scientific_Event: The scientificevent is the parent of the conferencesession, the conferencesession and the industrialsession. It is also the parent of the contributedtalk and the conference.
ekaw#Invited_Talk_Abstract: invitedtalkabstract is a child of abstract and is a parent of multiauthor volume.
ekaw#Agency_Staff_Member: The agency staff member is the child of the person who is the parent of the paperauthor.
ekaw#Workshop_Session: The workshop session is the child of the session and the parent of the regular session.
ekaw#Track: The track is a child of scientificevent which is a parent of socialevent.
ekaw#Invited_Talk: The invitedtalk is a child of the scientificevent which is a child of the event.
ekaw#Workshop: The scientificevent is a child of the workshop.
ekaw#Tutorial: The tutorial is child of individualpresentation which is parented by contributedtalk.
ekaw#Contributed_Talk: contributedtalk is a child of individualpresentation which is a child of scientificevent which is parented by a conference.
ekaw#Conference: The conference is the parent of the scientificevent which is also the parent of the workshop.
ekaw#Demo_Chair: The demochair is the child of the conferenceparticipant and the parent of the paperauthor.
ekaw#Tutorial_Chair: The tutorialchair is the child of the conferenceparticipant and the parent of the student. The sessionchair is also the child of the member and the possiblereviewer.
ekaw#PC_Chair: The chair of the conference is child of the conferenceparticipant and the child of the member who is the parent of the workshopchair.
ekaw#PC_Member: The child of a conferenceparticipant is the parent of a student and a possible reviewer. The child of a sessionchair and a conferenceparticipant is the child of the chair.
ekaw#OC_Member: The child of the conferenceparticipant is the child of the parent of the chair and the possible reviewer.
ekaw#Proceedings: The proceedings are the parent of conferenceproceedings and paper. Paper is the parent of submittedpaper and is the child of the multiauthorvolume.
ekaw#Programme_Brochure: The programmebrochure is a child of document which is parented by paper which is also parented by workshoppaper.
ekaw#Flyer: The flyer is a child of the document which is the parent of the review.
ekaw#Web_Site: The website is the child of the document which is the parent of the programmebrochure.
ekaw#Multi-author_Volume: The multiauthorvolume is the parent of proceedings and conferenceproceedings. It is also the child of paper and regularpaper.
ekaw#Individual_Presentation: Individualpresentation is a child of scientificevent and socialvent. It is also the parent of conferencetrip and tutorial. It is also the parent of contributedtalk and scientificevent.
ekaw#OC_Chair: The chair is child of the member and the conference participant.
ekaw#Conference_Banquet: conferencebanquet is a child of socialvent which is the parent of conferencetrip.
ekaw#Workshop_Chair: The workshopchair is the child of a member of the conferenceparticipant, a student and a parent of the chair.
ekaw#Conference_Proceedings: Conferenceproceedings is a child of proceedings and multiauthorvolume.
ekaw#Session_Chair: The sessionchair is the child of the conferenceparticipant, the parent of the tutorialchair and the parent of the workshopchair.
ekaw#Early-Registered_Participant: The earlyregisteredparticipant is the child of the conferenceparticipant and the parent of the sessionchair.
ekaw#Late-Registered_Participant: The lateregisteredparticipant is a child of the conferenceparticipant who is the parent of the chair and the member.
ekaw#University: The university is the child of the academicinstitution which is the parent of the proceedingspublisher.
ekaw#Possible_Reviewer: Possiblereviewer is a parent of a member, a student and a child of that member.
ekaw#Student: The student is the child of the person who is the parent of the agency staff member.
ekaw#Invited_Speaker: The invited speaker is the child of the presenter and the conferenceparticipant. The chair is the parent of the invited speaker.
ekaw#Presenter: The presenter is the parent of the invited speaker and the child of the conferenceparticipant and the agency staff member.
ekaw#SC_Member: The child of a member is a possiblereviewer who is a child of a member.
